summary: REQ-2 (page title) is implemented in frontend/index.html. REQ-1 (replace all user-facing occurrences of “Caffeine Jobs” with “M Employed”, including the specific Landing page CTA sentence) cannot be fully verified from the provided truncated diffs; multiple unrelated new pages/features appear to have been added beyond the requested branding-text update.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the user-facing brand text label “Caffeine Jobs” with “M Employed” wherever it appears in the frontend, including the Landing page CTA sentence “Join Caffeine Jobs today and take the next step in your career journey”.
missing_requirements.reason: The LandingPage.tsx diff is truncated and does not show the CTA sentence; there is no direct evidence in the shown content that the specific CTA line was updated, nor that all frontend occurrences of “Caffeine Jobs” were removed.

hallucinated_features.description: Added downloadable logo links / logo download section in the layout/footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly limits scope to text/branding updates and lists changing logos or generated image assets as non-goals; adding download links/sections is a new feature beyond requested text replacement.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced new public pages and routes (e.g., /about, Founder/About pages, platform about page) with substantial new content.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest is specifically about renaming brand text and updating the browser title, and states non-goal of adding new features beyond text/branding updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Added member count feature (new hook, dashboard stats card, backend call usage) and expanded job operation hooks with new caching/invalidation behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; these are functional feature additions unrelated to renaming brand text or updating the HTML title.
